## Useful Info

**Hell beasts** are bestial [tier-2 demons](/Tier-2_demon "Tier-2 demon") with randomized attributes. While their attacks are always fairly powerful and can [trample](/Trample "Trample") you back a square, their [AC](/AC "AC"), [EV](/EV "EV"), [HD](/HD "HD"), and [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") are low, and they have few resistances. They can be encountered in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), or the [Hells](/Hell "Hell") (particularly when summoned by [Geryon](/Geryon "Geryon")); they may also appear in one ending of [The Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair").

## Tips & Tricks

- Evoking the [horn of Geryon](/Horn_of_Geryon "Horn of Geryon") will summon 1-4 hell beasts at no cost (though you will not be able to do so again until you have gained a considerable amount of experience). Their friendliness and duration depend on your [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") skill.
- Unlike most demons, they lack [poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"). [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud") and the combo of [Olgreb's Toxic Radiance](/Olgreb%27s_Toxic_Radiance "Olgreb's Toxic Radiance") and [Ignite Poison](/Ignite_Poison "Ignite Poison") affect them very well.
- Be wary of their trampling ability if you expect to stair dance away. They may push you off the stairs and leave you extremely vulnerable, a common way to die in the [Vestibule of Hell](/Vestibule_of_Hell "Vestibule of Hell").

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), hell beasts will be renamed to **sin beasts**, and their bite will have [antimagic](/Antimagic "Antimagic"). Additionally, their HD will be increased from 7->12.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), hell beasts varied in speed, from "fast" to "faster".
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), the Horn of Geryon only summoned a single hell beast, and it was always hostile.
- Prior to [0.9](/0.9 "0.9"), they were simply called "beasts."
- Prior to [0.8](/0.8 "0.8"), they could not trample.

An abominable crossbreed of beast and man that makes horrible barking noises.

Useful Info

Hell beasts are bestial tier-2 demons with randomized attributes. While their attacks are always fairly powerful and can trample you back a square, their AC, EV, HD, and willpower are low, and they have few resistances. They can be encountered in the Abyss, Pandemonium, or the Hells (particularly when summoned by Geryon); they may also appear in one ending of The Lair.

Tips & Tricks

  • Evoking the horn of Geryon will summon 1-4 hell beasts at no cost (though you will not be able to do so again until you have gained a considerable amount of experience). Their friendliness and duration depend on your Evocations skill.
  • Unlike most demons, they lack poison resistance. Mephitic Cloud and the combo of Olgreb's Toxic Radiance and Ignite Poison affect them very well.
  • Be wary of their trampling ability if you expect to stair dance away. They may push you off the stairs and leave you extremely vulnerable, a common way to die in the Vestibule of Hell.

History

  • In 0.32, hell beasts will be renamed to sin beasts, and their bite will have antimagic. Additionally, their HD will be increased from 7->12.
  • Prior to 0.17, hell beasts varied in speed, from "fast" to "faster".
  • Prior to 0.14, the Horn of Geryon only summoned a single hell beast, and it was always hostile.
  • Prior to 0.9, they were simply called "beasts."
  • Prior to 0.8, they could not trample.
